data.market_trends: There is a rising trend in sustainable travel, with travelers increasingly seeking eco-friendly options and cultural experiences that support local communities.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers often prioritize unique experiences and are willing to pay a premium for culturally immersive and eco-friendly options. Flexibility in travel dates is common due to unpredictable weather.
data.competitive_landscape: Guatemala is positioning itself as a top-tier destination for adventure and cultural tourism, competing effectively against other Central American countries through strong marketing strategies.
data.seasonal_factors: Travel patterns fluctuate with seasonal weather; peak season aligns with the dry months while the wet season sees a decline in tourists due to rainfall and potential natural hazards.
